thread.title: Banking Technology Readers’ Choice Awards 2015: shortlist announced
thread.title_full: Banking Technology Readers’ Choice Awards 2015: shortlist announced

author: Banking Tech
title: Banking Technology Readers’ Choice Awards 2015: shortlist announced
text:
Home » Format » News » Banking Technology Readers’ Choice Awards 2015: shortlist announced Banking Technology Readers’ Choice Awards 2015: shortlist announced 20   Banking Tech Email Several new entries appear in the shortlist of vendors whose products and services have been voted for by Banking Technology readers – and several previous winners re-appear under new ownership following acquisitions. The winners in each category will be announced at a gala dinner on 11 November at the Grand Connaught Rooms in London. For more details of the event, click here . 
Best Core Banking Product/Service
